sn12.39:1.2: “Yañca, bhikkhave, ceteti yañca pakappeti yañca anuseti, ārammaṇametaṃ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
sn12.39:1.4: Tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇe virūḷhe nāmarūpassa avakkanti hoti.
sn12.39:2.1: No ce, bhikkhave, ceteti no ce pakappeti, atha ce anuseti, ārammaṇametaṃ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
sn12.39:2.3: Tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇe virūḷhe nāmarūpassa avakkanti hoti.
sn12.39:3.1: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, no ceva ceteti no ca pakappeti no ca anuseti, ārammaṇametaṃ na hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
sn12.39:3.2: Ārammaṇe asati patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn12.39:3.3: Tadappatiṭṭhite viññāṇe avirūḷhe nāmarūpassa avakkanti na hoti.
